info.name: 1 Infinera PoC TEF BR (v1.5.6)
info.description:
v1.5.3 => v1.5.4 (2020-09-22 / Janne Karvonen):
- tg-type => tag-type
- spoke-role => any-to-any-role
- hub-spoke => any-to-any

v1.5 => v.1.5.1 (2020-09-16 / Janne Karvonen):

- A.2.1
  - POST / Create L3VPN service (VPN.L3.Add)
    - "vpn-service-topology": "hub-spoke"
        =>
      "vpn-service-topology": "any-to-any"

  - POST / Create L3VPN vpn-node (VPN.L3.Add)
    - "node-role": "spoke-role"
        =>
      "node-role": "any-to-any-role"

  - POST / Create L3VPN Access (VPN.L3.Access.Add)
    - Added "bgp" under "routing-protocol"

  - DEL / Delete Site Attachment
    - Deleted this step because it's not valid with the current YANG models

  - DEL / Delete Site Network Access
    - Changed the URL because it's mandatory to specify SNA id:
      {{protocol}}://{{server}}:{{port}}/restconf/data/ietf-l3vpn-ntw:l3vpn-ntw/sites/site=f-br-sp-spo-msvn-hl3-03/site-network-accesses
        => 
      {{protocol}}://{{server}}:{{port}}/restconf/data/ietf-l3vpn-ntw:l3vpn-ntw/sites/site=f-br-sp-spo-msvn-hl3-03/site-network-accesses/site-network-access=L3VPN_A21_sna_1

- A.2.2
  - POST / Create L3VPN service (VPN.L3.Add)
    - "vpn-service-topology": "hub-spoke"
        =>
      "vpn-service-topology": "any-to-any"

  - POST / Create L3VPN vpn-node (VPN.L3.Add)
    - "node-role": "spoke-role"
        =>
      "node-role": "any-to-any-role"

  - POST / Create L3VPN Access (VPN.L3.Access.Add)
    - Added "bgp" and "static" under "routing-protocol"

  - DEL / Delete Site Attachment
    - Deleted this step because it's not valid with the current YANG models

  - DEL / Delete Site Network Access
    - Changed the URL because it's mandatory to specify SNA id:
      {{protocol}}://{{server}}:{{port}}/restconf/data/ietf-l3vpn-ntw:l3vpn-ntw/sites/site=f-br-sp-spo-msvn-hl3-03/site-network-accesses
        =>
      {{protocol}}://{{server}}:{{port}}/restconf/data/ietf-l3vpn-ntw:l3vpn-ntw/sites/site=f-br-sp-spo-msvn-hl3-03/site-network-accesses/site-network-access=L3VPN_A22_sna_1

- A.2.3
  - POST / Create L3VPN Bearer (VPN.L3.Bearer.Add)
    - Deleted this step because it's not relevant with loopback endpoints
